1.content:
You're walking to your friends house as you pass by a coffee shop. You glance inside and there is your crush.
Who is your crush.
1.title: First contact

11.content:
You have chosen boy now which boy?
Charlie- 13 years old a lot younger than you but that hasn't stopped you from flirting average build for his age which means he's about your height still innocent but super curious about Everything

Alex- 14 years old still younger but you have been friends with him since he was 9 and you were 11 you know him well and know that he is extremely horny and loves bugs.

Seth- 15 years old, he's almost your age but because you're short and small he's tall for his age he looks huge compared to you he about 6ft and has lots of muscle, he has a girlfriend but has said multiple times that he a bisexual and has said outright to you that he would date you.

Mike- 16 years old, Mike is taller than Seth at about 6ft 3in, he likes playing basketball and also has a girlfriend but has never said anything about being gay or bisexual so you haven't really talked to him.
Kyle- 17 years old, being older than you is not bad and Kyle takes the cake on size his is huge at 6ft 4in he is taller than Mike and hes more muscular than any other guy at school, he's captain of the football team and jumps from girl to girl every week.
11.title: Boy

111.content:
You glance in the coffee shop and see Charlie sitting in there with his mom Amanda so you decide to go in and say hi. The second you walk in Charlie yells.
"Danny!" And runs towards you he stops right in front of you and says.
"How's it going?" Charlie was always hyper, he acted you than he was but it made him cute.
"Hey Charlie. I'm good how are you?"
"I'm good too! Mom and I we went to the park and we were walking and for this gun, and we grabbed it and we called out to see if anyone lost it and no one claimed it so then we took it and it's in my mom's bag! Wanna see it?" you were kinda thinking it was like some kind of just nerf gun so you're not really interested but then Amanda steps in and says.
"Oh that's a good idea and while you boys look at that I'm gonna use the little ladies room." As Amanda started walking away you couldent help but start at her boobs as she turn around with that tank top that made it seem like her boobs were gonna bounce right of there. And after she turned your eyes went down to that great big booty coupled with tight short shorts, she knew she had a great body and she liked showing it off. You watch her walk all the way to the bathroom and waited until she disappeared behind the swinging bathroom door before finally refocusing on reality.
"Danny? Daaaaannny? DANNY!" Yelled Charlie while trying to show you the piece of equipment.
"Yeah, yeah, what did you say?"
"I said look at this gun!" you look down at the "gun" and and almost instantly seen it wasn't an nerf gun. It was white with black stripes along it and it had bright green clear plastic on certain point of the gun including the tip of the barrel, a big piece on the top, and a couple on the grip.
"Whoa that is kinda cool."
"Yeah and guess what!"
"What?"
"I know what it does!"
"Oh yeah? What does it do?"
"do you want me to show you?"
"Sure why not?"
"OKAY!" The hyperactive boy shouted and almost instantly pointed the gun at you, gave a quick count down from three, and pulled the trigger. A bright beam of light fired from the tip of the barrel hitting you directly in the forehead a strange sensation over came you as you suddenly felt like you had zero energy and you were absolutely helpless. The world around you started to get bigger and bigger and your cloths get looser and looser.
"He's shrinking me! Like this is actually happening!" you think to yourself.

How small do you become?
111.title: Charlie 13

choices: I'm not mad but I really wish you would have asked
I'm not mad but I don't mind being like this
Please keep me like this I've wanted you to be my giant my whole life.
1111.content:
As soon as the blast stopped you fell to your knees trying to catch your breath, that's when you notice that your knees happened to fall right in a the groove of one of the tiles on the floor. The grooves were thick enough to accommodate you entire body into it, that's when you started looking around to your left a huge white expanse with a black wall far away and an impossibly huge green wall behind it. to your right another huge expanse with the occasional chrome poll coming from the ground. That's when you followed the poke upward to see a giant set of tables and chairs, it all suddenly clicked the groove wasn't massive, it was normal. The black wall with the green wall behind it didn't change, it was just the baseboard and the normal green wall behind it and... Charlie, your eyes slowly drifted over to the feet of the titanic teenager to be met with his bright red and white converse shoes and bright white socks, slowly your eyes drift up his bare shins and knee caps as you are in awe of his gigantic blue sports shorts, further up you are met with his equally as bright and blue t-shirt and then his face... His face was massive and his big blue eyes were locked onto you through his long blonde hair, that was slightly in his vision from being poorly covered by his backward facing base ball cap. You're speechless and apparently so was he because instead of asking you anything he just started reaching down for you, you wanted to run away but your legs were frozen with fear as his gargantuan hand slowly made its way towards you and roughly scooped you and brought you up to examine you closer. He opened his palm which your legs buckled under you so you just sat down on this 13 year old's palm which you could easily walk around on. You're eyes locked onto his and the silence was broken when this giant said this.
"So I guess it's a shrink ray huh?" You're still frozen with fear but even if you could talk you couldn't say much because you breathed in the kids breath and started gagging on his poor mouth management. It smelt like milk, onion, and banana all at the same time.
"Are you mad at me? Is it because I used the gun on you without permission?" You weren't really sure what to say, he seemed genuinely concerned about your well being so you decided to try and play your cards right.
1111.title: 1 inch

112.content:
You see Alex in the coffee shop, you decide to go in and say hi. As you walk in he looks up at you and says.
"Hey buddy, what up?"
"Oh not much just heading to a friend's house, what about you?"
"Well actually I found a thing."
"A thing?"
"Yeah a thing and I used said thing on some asshole on the street and well..."
"And well what? What did you do?"
"Well look." he said pulling his hands away from the table, you look at where his hands were and see a small thing just sitting there, you think it's a bug, that would make sense but it's not moving quickly like a bug would. You look closer ans see that it's standing on two legs and you realize what it is.
"IS THAT HIM?!" You yell. Alex covers your mouth and says.
"Don't yell do you want people to know I have a shrink ray?"
"Right I suppose that would be bad. Okay so what are you gonna do to him?"
"Oh I don't know. Maybe eat him or sit on him or step on him or shove him up my butt, I'll get creative." You look with concern at the tiny man and say.
"Maybe you should grow him back, like it's not like he'll be mean again or else this'll happen. And he won't tell anyone, cause who'll believe him?" you tell Alex hoping that he'll let him go.
"See I could do that, or I could shrink you too." he says slowly pointing the gun at you. You lift your hands up and say.
"WHOA now Alex we're friends, don't shrink me."
"How small do you wanna be?"
"I don't wanna be any smaller than I am right now please don't."
"No I think this'll be fun." he says pulling the trigger a green beam fires from the Tim of the shrink ray and hits you in the head as you start shrinking you watch at Alex grows huge and you start going down and down and down until finally it stops. You drop you your hands an knees exhausted from the ordeal. Suddenly you feel a thud in front of you look up and see a wall of denim, Alex knelt down in front of you. And started reaching down you stand up and run from him booking it across the coffee shop he easily catches you and grabs you by the leg lifting you up and dangles you by your ankle, you have a sense of virtigo and you soar upwards, he holds you up by his face and says.
"Awww you're even cuter now then you were before a shrunk you. I guess this would be a good time to tell you this, I was always planning on shrinking you Danny, I've always thought that you were just adorable even though you're older than me it might be because you're shorter than me but I've always had a thing for you. Even when you walked in I got a raging boner." him saying this made you look down at his crotch and sure enough he's got a small bulge in his pants.
"Oh yeah it's even bigger now." he carries you over to the table he was at and sets you down by the other tiny man. This is when you realise that you are butt-ass naked.
"Now where to put you two hmm... I know!" he said picking up both of you and taking you to the bathroom, he takes you in the stall and puts you down on the seat of the toilet. He takes the other man and drops his own pants and underwear revealing his raging boner he turns around and licks the man up before bending over and bringing him around to his ass and pushing his victim through his tight hole, he let out small screams as he was pushed in. Alex clenched his cheeks before turning to you and saying.
"What? I said I would do that." he chucks as he pulls his underwear and pants back up. He bends over add picks you up and says.
"now I think I have the perfect spot for you buddy.

Where does he put him?
112.title: Alex 14

choices: Seth shrinks you when Samantha goes to the bathroom
Samantha shrinks you when Seth goes to the bathroom
113.content:
You see Seth sitting with his girlfriend Samantha inside the cafe they are sitting by the window and they look outside and see you they both wave and you return the gesture. Seth gets up and meets you outside, then invites you in.
"Hey Danny wanna come in and sit for a while?" he said wrapping his arm around your shoulder, he's wearing a sleeveless shirt so this causes your shoulder to go deep into his hairy pit and a pungent smell comes from the now open crevasse. You don't mind though in fact that's one of the things you like about Seth, is that he's so confident and extroverted around anyone like how he came out the invite you in without hesitation. The smell coming from his arm pit however smells vile but you like it, it's a bit of a fetish for you but it's also something you've never shared.
"Sure, I can for a little bit."
"Awesome!" he said pulling you into the café. You sheepishly wave to his girlfriend as you awkwardly sit down with the pair, you are officially third wheeling.
"So... What's up?" Seth's girlfriend asks you. She has dark brown hair and typically has dark skin because of her tan, she works as a lifeguard on a beach which keeps her skin a dark brown, she's a couple years older than Seth at 17 but it doesn't really show because she has very young features and Seth has older features.
"Oh not much just walking to a friend's house for some video game."
"Cool and how old are you friends?" She said in an almost motherly tone.
"Umm 14. Why do you ask?
"Oh just curious, so he's old enough to look after you right?" I looked over at Seth with confusion and he shared the look.
"Ummm babe?"
"Yes Seth?"
"He's older than I am..." Her eye widened and she looked at him with a shocked look on her face.
"What?!"
"Yeah I'm 16." you chimed in which made her even more surprised.
"This is something that I probably should have been told, SETH!" Seth slumped down in his seat out of embarrassment.
"No it's not his fault it happens all the time, actually I'm curious. How old do you think I look?" you inquired trying to change the mood a little. She looked at you debating and said.
"Umm probably 9 or 10?" you nodded your head at the valid answer.
"Okay, cool most people say like 12 or 13 but I've had people also say 7 so not a bad guess at all." You say with a smile. This seems to make her feel better about treating you like a child.

For the next little while you all chat about things mostly you and Seth's girlfriend picking in Seth but other things as well. But you're reading this for shrinking stuff. So how's it going to happen?
113.title: Seth 15

115.content:
Kyle we sitting at a table on his phone and you decide it's now or never to talk to him, you walk inside the shop and Kyle looks up at you. Your about to introduce yourself we he says.
"Hey your Daniel right?" you're shocked when he says your name and nod at his question
"Sweet I'm Kyle." He says sticking his hand out for you to shake it. You grab his enormous hand and he proceeds to do all the work in moving both of your arms up and down.
"Are you good when it comes to gadgets and things?" This question takes you by surprise but you say.
"Yeah I'm alright what's up?"
"Well I found this thing in the park under some leaves and I just can't figure it out." He says pulling something out of his bag. You look to his bag as see what appears to be a toy gun of sorts being mostly white with transparent green plastic on the tip of the barrel and on the top of the gun, it has a green trigger and a green foam for the grip. You reach out and grab onto the gun and start examining it, by it weight you determine its made of some strong metal like titanium or something and it's really well made by the looks of it.
"Hmmm have you tried just pulling the trigger?"
"What? No what if something bad happens?"
"Well how bad could it really be? It's definitely not a projectile weapon or else this green plastic wouldent be on the tip of the barrel and there is no setting that I can see... Well wait a sec." You say and you see some kind of dial of on the back of the gun, it flips back and forth from on extreme to the next like no in between like forward or backward, side to side.
" Looks like there may be a setting but I don't know what it's being set to."You pause for a minute.
"That cup empty?" You say gesturing to the coffee cup on the table.
"Uhhh yeah why?" you point the gun at the cup and get ready to pull the trigger.
"WAIT! shouldent we do this somewhere else like less public?" He says placing his hand on the gun.
"Where do you suggest?" He thinks about it for a moment and says
"My house, I got a big backyard and my parents are gone for the weekend and nobody but us will know." The offer is intriguing and this would give you a chance to go to his house and potentially get closer to him.
"Yeah sure that sounds like a good idea." He seems relieved.
"Cool let's go." He says standing up and grabbing his bag and walking out the front door with you in toe. He unlocks the doors on his 2014 chevy camaro and jumps in, you hop in the other side and buckle up he rolls both windows down but there is an overwhelming smell in the car and it's not pleasant, sweat. He's definitely and sex in this car... And that all you can think about.
You get to his house and walk inside he says
"Leave your shoes on and follow me." you do as he says and follow him out the back door. He goes to the shed and grabs a piece of fire wood and places it on the chopping block the stands beside you and says.
"Alright, shoot it." You bring the gun up and pull the trigger, a bright glow emits from the green parts of the gun, it glows brighter and brighter as if its charging up, then suddenly and green beam fires from the tip of the gun hitting the wood directly as a green aura envelopes the wood it slowly gets bigger and bigger. You release the trigger and you both walk over to the piece of wood and say.
"Cool." Simultaneously.
"Can I see that." Kyle says you hand the gun over to Kyle still in awe about what you just witnessed.
"So if that way did this then what happens if we turn the dial and fire again?" You shrug your shoulders the step back behind Kyle to get close to him. This time the order in which things happened we reversed and the beam fired from the gun and then the gun sounded line it we charging up. The boys looked at the log and noticed that it two was going backwards and shrinking now.
"So one way is shrink and the other way is grow then. It's a size manipulation ray." You say triumphantly.
"Yeah but, hmm I wonder." Kyle says.
"You wonder wh-." was all you could say before Kyle pulled the trigger when it was pointed at you the green aura enveloped you as you started shrinking.

How much does Kyle shrink you?
115.title: Kyle 17

info.brief_description: A story based around your crush finding a shrink ray and wanting you use it.
info.description:
Your name is Daniel but your friends call you Danny, you are 16 years old but short for your age coming in at 5.0ft, this along with you cute features like freckles lack of any facial hair and a higher voice, makes people think you're closer to 12 or 13. People including your crush think this.
You're crush can be a guy or a girl doesn't matter.
You can make it as horny as you want, these aren't real people it doesn't matter that he is under age
Other than that have fun with it.
